actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should extend recognition to a future, free Cuban Government in exile.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should: (1) recognize the proposed democratically elected Cuban government in exile as the legitimate government of the Cuban people; and (2) refrain from extending any privileges of a legitimate government to the Communist Government of Cuba.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should extend recognition to a future, free Cuban Government in exile.
